_header: Dan John London monk of Croyland
_description: Dan John and his fish dinner — one eight-rhyme stanza

CamMag5.Transcription:
Daen Ihoen londonmoken of croylandeIn hes cloystermahet a
                    noesterIn e dees of gouldewen he haes stvun ys feyshe ma set a
                    waysdeys as a chourll should
CamMag5.Note: End flyleaf; added by later hand.
CamMag5.Editions:
James,  Montague Rhodes. 
             A Descriptive Catalogue of the Manuscripts in the College Library of
                Magdalene College Cambridge.
         Cambridge: at the UP, 1909: 5.
